alert.note: Alert for Fannin (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 19 at 2:24PM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Fannin County through 245 PM CDT... At 224 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Randolph, or 9 miles southwest of Bonham, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Bonham, Leonard, Trenton, Dodd City, Bonham State Park, Randolph, Bailey, Ely, Gober and Cotton Center. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 800 PM CDT for north central Texas.
